TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: Fetch folder name, mapping name, workflow name
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: EXP_FETCH_MAPPING_INFO

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: Fetch folder name, mapping name, workflow name
INSTANCE.NAME: EXP_FETCH_MAPPING_INFO

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Sql Query
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: select 'WEH' as SOURCE ,W.LAST_UPDATED ,W.WORKITEM_ID ,S.STATUS ,W.EVENT_DATE ,W.EVENT_ID ,T.TASK_NAME ,L.LOCATION_NAME ,W.LOGIN_ID ,W.LAST_MODIFIED AS LAST_MODIFIED from $$Prefix.WORKITEM_EVENT_HISTORY W left join $$Prefix.WORKITEM_EVENT WE on W.EVENT_ID=WE.EVENT_ID left join $$Prefix.STATUS S on WE.STATUS_ID=S.STATUS_ID left join $$Prefix.USER_INFO U on W.LOGIN_ID=U.LOGIN_ID left join $$Prefix.LOCATION L on U.LOCATION_ID=L.LOCATION_ID left join $$Prefix.TASK T on W.TASK_ID=T.TASK_ID WHERE W.LAST_MODIFIED>TO_TIMESTAMP ('$$last_weh_pull_date', 'YYYYDDMMHH24MISSFF')
